first_translate: fiona green...

hangle: 그녀는 백작가의 사생아로 불운한 유년 시절을 보냈으나
first_translate: she was born as the illegitimate child of a noble family and had a difficult childhood.
but she discovered her talent for magic when she grew older,
and became known as one of the greatest mages later on.
it’s your typical protagonist cliché story.

hangle: 그러나 피오나는 절대로 주인공이 될 수 없다.
first_translate: but fiona can never become the main character.
fiona,

hangle: 이 아비의 말을 듣고 있는 거냐.
first_translate: did you hear what I just said?
count green is fiona's biological father.
I'm sorry, father.
that little brat has no manners at all.

hangle: 저리 천한 건 신경 쓰지 마세요, 아버지.
first_translate: do not worry about that lowly creature, father.
caindel is the eldest son of house green.
I really want to shut him up right now.

hangle: 천한 취급이 아무리 열 받아도 참아야 한다.
first_translate: no matter how angry I am, I must hold back my anger.
right now, fiona is only thirteen years old.

hangle: 별다른 힘도 없는 그린 가문의 짐 덩어리 사생아일 뿐이니까.
first_translate: all she is... is a powerless bastard daughter of house green.
this is where I find myself.
in this girl named fiona green.
for now, she may seem like nothing but a useless bastard child,

hangle: 훗날 천재 마법사로 칭송받게 되는 피오나!
first_translate: but someday, she will become a genius magician!

hangle: 그럼에도 불구하고, 피오나가 되었다는 건 좋은 상황이 아니다.
first_translate: even so, being reborn into fiona isn’t exactly good news.
of course, even if she does have a bright future ahead of her,
the thing is, fiona becomes the final boss instead of the heroine!

hangle: 그것도 주인공 커플의 사랑의 힘에 장렬히 죽음을 맞이하는 최종 보스!
first_translate: not only that, she dies by the power of love from the hero couple!

hangle: 정말 부정하고 싶지만… 이건 이미 운명적으론 정해진 결말이다.
first_translate: as much as I don't want to believe it, this ending has already been set in stone.

hangle: 이곳은 황제인 남주인공과 성녀인 여주인공이 연애하며 세계를 구하는 내용의 소설 속 세계다.
first_translate: this world belongs to a novel where the male lead, who is also the emperor, falls in love with the female lead, who is a saint, while saving the world together.
and here,

hangle: 이곳에 악역인 피오나를 위한 자비는 없다.
first_translate: there is absolutely no mercy for villains like fiona.

hangle: 마지막쯤 피오나는 불사에 가까운 존재가 되어 주인공 커플을 위협한다.
first_translate: near the end, fiona almost becomes invincible and threatens the lives of the two protagonists.

hangle: 그에 남자 주인공은 검으로 피오나의 목을 베고,
first_translate: then, the male lead cuts off her head with his sword,

hangle: 뽑혔음에도 박동하는 검게 물든 심장 깊숙이 검을 박는다.
first_translate: stabs her heart which continues to beat despite having been ripped out,

hangle: 그렇게 피오나의 목은 성벽에 효시 되고
first_translate: hangs her severed head over the castle walls,
burns her body,

hangle: 피오나의 영혼은 어둠 속에 빠져 영원히 끝나지 않을 고통을 받는다…
first_translate: and traps her soul inside darkness forevermore.

hangle: 이것이 나의 미래가 될지 모르는 ‘피오나’의 운명.
first_translate: this could very well be my fate as "fiona."

hangle: 차라리 지금 죽으면 편히 갈 수 있으려나.
first_translate: wouldn't it be better to die now than suffer such a terrible death?
wait, let me stop thinking about this for now.
if I get distracted, I'll get hit with a staff again.

hangle: 요즘 전쟁의 상황이 좋지 않다는 건 다들 알고 있을 게다.
first_translate: I’m sure everyone knows our situation during these times of war hasn’t been going too well lately.

hangle: 황궁에서 북방 전선에 보낼 마법사를 차출하라는 명이 떨어졌다.
first_translate: an order came down from the palace asking us to send magicians to fight against the northern front.
to our household.
currently, we’re six years before the start of the original story.

hangle: 마물들과의 싸움에 밀려 제국이 한참 불리할 시기다.
first_translate: at present, the empire is losing its battle against demonic creatures.

hangle: 그저 남녀 주인공이 악룡과 마물로부터 세상을 구원하기 위해 설정된 배경이지만…
first_translate: this is merely background information used to explain why the heroes save the world from evil dragons and monsters,
but currently, this is reality for me.

hangle: 때문에 너희들 중 한 명은 북방의 전선에 참전해야 한다.
first_translate: so because of this, one of you three needs to go join the battlefield.
going to war?
me?
my goodness...

hangle: 그린 가문은 제국의 마법사 가문 중 하나이고,
first_translate: house green is one of many households of magicians within the empire,
so naturally, they would ask for support from the imperial palace.
the problem is,

hangle: 여기서 대체 누가 전쟁에 나가냐는 것이다.
first_translate: exactly who goes to war.

hangle: 내 자식 중에 이 영광스러운 일에 자원할 사람이 있는지 궁금하구나.
first_translate: now, I wonder if any of my children wish to volunteer themselves for this glorious task.
oh!
let her do it, then.

hangle: 나를 제외한 모두가 백작 부인의 소생.
first_translate: apart from me, everyone else is the offspring of the countess.

hangle: 다들 쓸모없는 사생아인 내가 전쟁에 나가기를 바랄 테다.
first_translate: they’ll probably want me, their useless bastard sister, to go to war.

hangle: 그 사생아가 겨우 열세 살 된 어린아이 일지라도.
first_translate: even though I’m still only thirteen years old.
dear husband, look! our youngest wants to volunteer herself.

hangle: 수줍어서 크게 말은 못하는 것 같지만,
first_translate: she seems too shy to say anything aloud,
w-wait...!
p-pardon me...!
you wretched child...
ahh, yes. so you’ve decided to go.
father and son are totally in sync.
is there something behind this?
this is a great honor representing our family name.

hangle: 천한 네가 이런 기회를 얻을 수 있는 것에 감사하도록.
first_translate: be grateful that someone as worthless as yourself gets to take part in this opportunity.
okay, fiona.

hangle: 카인델은 가문을 이어야 하고, 난 곧 결혼할 예정이란다.
first_translate: kaindel must inherit the family business, and I plan to marry soon.
zane is engaged to be married as well.

hangle: 상황이 이러니 네가 가는 게 좋겠구나.
first_translate: given the circumstances, it’d best suit you to go.

hangle: 사생아는 자격이 없다고 마법도 가르쳐 준 적 없으면서!
first_translate: how dare he?! he never taught me any spells saying bastards weren’t worthy enough!
he locked me away in the attic every day and treated me poorly.

hangle: 마법을 쓰는 기본적인 방법은 알고 있지만.
first_translate: I know the basics of using magic,
but...

hangle: 그래, 이건 애초에 선택지가 없는 문제였다.
first_translate: alright, alright. I guess there wasn’t another option anyway.

hangle: 이 저택에 내 편 따위는 없다.
first_translate: after all, nobody in this mansion is on my side.

hangle: 주연도 아니었던 피오나에게 주어진 과거 설정은 단 한 줄.
first_translate: the backstory given to fiona, who wasn’t originally the main character, consisted of only one line:
“she suffered abuse from her own family members since she was a bastard.”
alright...
aah
aah
I-I’ll go.

hangle: 만약 가족들을 없앤다고 해도 감옥에나 갇히겠지
first_translate: even if I were to kill my entire family, I'd most likely rot in prison.

hangle: 가야 한다면 차라리 내 두 발로 나가자.
first_translate: if I need to leave, I might as well walk out voluntarily.
yes, excellent choice.
I couldn’t be prouder of you.
finally, you've proven yourself useful after raising you all these years.

hangle: 사람 취급도 안 하고 다락방에 가둬놓다 웬일로 가족 모임에 부르나 했다.
first_translate: I thought maybe today would be different since he called me downstairs, unlike other days when he kept me trapped in the attic without treating me like human.

hangle: 1년 전 이 몸에 빙의했다는 걸 알았을 때도 이렇게 슬프진 않았어.
first_translate: when I found out last year that I reincarnated into this body, I didn't feel as sad as I did now.

hangle: 본래 이 자리에 있었을 최종 악역 피오나도
first_translate: I wonder whether or not the villainous fiona felt the same way...
...when she sat in my place.

hangle: 일평생 누구에게도 사랑받지 못한 피오나는 세상을 원망했고
first_translate: fiona resented the whole world throughout her life because she was unloved by anyone.

hangle: 결국 잘못된 선택으로 돌이킬 수 없는 늪에 빠지게 된다.
first_translate: eventually, she made poor choices and fell deep into irreversible despair.

hangle: 하지만 그녀와 달리 그 누구도 원망할 생각이 안 든다.
first_translate: unlike her however, I resent none of those people sitting across from me.
after all, this is the world I created.
